column4: my firefox crashes every few minutes in 10.04 , i think its because of flash. is this a know problem? any solutions?
in sae mode it works ok?
, what is sae mode? save mode?
where it disable add on
did it work ok before?
i will have a look ...
here /usr/bin/firefox -safe-mode
any luck?
it crashed even in safe-mode now. with segmentation fault
well, i used a very old fedora core 3 before and now installed 10.04. in FC3 and very old firefox 2 it was stable :)
did it work ok on ubuntu before ?
i didnt had any ubuntu on this computer before.
with fresh install it orked ok?
i had the feeling that the very fresh 10.04 install was not very stable at the beginning. but my first application i installed was firefox... so cant tell
try creatng new profile
rename $HOME/.mozilaa to $HOME/.mozilla.backup
so others dont have alot problems with firefox (and flash)? its more a problem with my installation you think?
well some people did complain about it, your seems different , prob. sound settings messed
i would give profile a try for sure
ok, will try with new profile ...
it crashed again even with a new profile, argh
thanks for the help, at least i now know that the problem is somewhere deeper in the system
